mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.post_no, p.user_no, p.card_no, p.public_status, p.category, p.memo, p.amount, p.place, p.transaction_date, p.great_count, p.stupid_count, p.renew_status, u.username, u.img_url as user_img_url FROM post p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.user_no = u.user_no WHERE p.post_no = #{no}

SELECT p.post_no, p.user_no, p.card_no, p.public_status, p.category, p.memo, p.amount, p.place, p.transaction_date, p.great_count, p.stupid_count, p.renew_status, u.username FROM post p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.user_no = u.user_no WHERE p.user_no = #{userNo} AND DATE(p.transaction_date) = #{date} AND p.renew_status = true
AND p.public_status = true
ORDER BY p.transaction_date ASC

SELECT p.post_no, p.user_no, p.card_no, p.public_status, p.category, p.memo, p.amount, p.place, p.transaction_date, p.great_count, p.stupid_count, p.renew_status, u.username FROM post p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.user_no = u.user_no WHERE p.user_no = #{userNo} AND p.category = #{category} AND p.renew_status = true
AND p.public_status = true
ORDER BY p.transaction_date ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND renew_status = true
